description: Gets information about a device pool.

nested_items.name: devicePool
nested_items.description: An object that contains information about the requested device pool.
CURATED: A device pool that is created and managed by AWS Device Farm.
PRIVATE: A device pool that is created and managed by the device pool developer.

nested_items.name: rules
nested_items.description: Information about the device pool's rules.

nested_items.name: attribute
nested_items.description: The rule's stringified attribute. For example, specify the value as "\"abc\"".

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: Specifies how Device Farm compares the rule's attribute to the value. For the operators that are supported by each attribute, see the attribute descriptions.

nested_items.name: maxDevices
nested_items.description: The number of devices that Device Farm can add to your device pool. Device Farm adds devices that are available and meet the criteria that you assign for the rules parameter. Depending on how many devices meet these constraints, your device pool might contain fewer devices than the value for this parameter.
